lead_paragraph: Relations between Israel and Turkey have been dragged to a new low, experts say, threatening to derail relations between the two close U.S. allies.
snippet: Relations between Israel and Turkey have been dragged to a new low, experts say, threatening to derail relations between the two close U.S. allies.

headline.seo: Israeli Raid Jeopardizes Relations With Turkey
headline.print_headline: Raid at Sea Jeopardizes Long-Friendly Relations Between Israel and Turkey

byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu contributed reporting from Istanbul, and Ethan Bronner from Washington.
